summary: Verified ProtonMail Bridge systemd service running correctly with IMAP (1143) and SMTP (1025) ports listening. Tested mbsync and himalaya integration - both working. Created comprehensive documentation at docs/protonmail-bridge-setup.md with architecture overview, service management commands, verification checklist, and troubleshooting guide.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive ProtonMail Bridge systemd setup and troubleshooting documentation
Implementation summary with verification results for all 4 phases

completion_data.completion_summary: Verified ProtonMail Bridge systemd user service is running correctly with ports 1143/1025 listening. Confirmed mbsync and himalaya email clients work with the service. Created comprehensive documentation at docs/protonmail-bridge-setup.md covering service management, verification, and troubleshooting.

next_steps: Review documentation and verify service survives system reboot
